comments.comment:
The bug is probably around these lines: # in file lib/streamlit/__init__.py
def _set_log_level(): # TODO: Check if this function is being called? Put print() statement or use # a debugger (for example, PyCharm and VS Code have nice onces). If not, why? # TODO: If being called, then set_log_level may not be doing the right # thing! Why? _logger.set_log_level(_config.get_option("global.logLevel").upper()) _logger.init_tornado_logs()
Looks like the config gets parsed (and _set_log_level gets called) before the cli arguments are parsed.
